entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as the one who gasped and was concerned about Lupin being a werewolf. He is mentioned in the first line of the text.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is described as a werewolf and is mentioned in the second line of the text. He is also referred to by Hermione when she says 'you'.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as the one who knew about Lupin's condition and is mentioned in the third line of the text. She is also referred to by Lupin when he says 'you'.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as the one who assigned an essay that Hermione worked on and is mentioned in the fourth line of the text.

entities.name: boggart
entities.description: The boggart is described as a monster that changes into the moon when it sees Lupin. It is mentioned in the sixth line of the text.

relationships.description: Hermione knew about Lupin's condition and he asked her how long she had known. This is mentioned in the third line of the text.
Snape assigned an essay that Hermione worked on, which helped Lupin's condition to be revealed. This is mentioned in the fourth and fifth lines of the text.
Hermione realized that the boggart changed into the moon when it saw Lupin. This is mentioned in the sixth line of the text.
